title: NCLT rejects resolution plan for Cambay Hotels operator
description: “The resolution plan approved by CoC (committee of creditors) has not been done with a process that can be approved by this adjudicating authority as it lacked a due and transparent process of examining each application on its merits,” the division bench of judicial member Chitra Hankare and technical member Velamur G. Venkata Chalapathy said in its order on March 1.
